name: Neon Snap
description:
Neon Snap is a simple to learn but challenging game of pixel-art themed puzzles made from tetrominos! Each puzzle is made up of seven different tetromino blocks, which all snap together inside each level's grid to create pixel art shapes. Click and drag pieces onto the grid, rotate and move them around until they all snap together to complete each puzzle! Can you solve all 100+ levels?

- Solve puzzles with tetrominos!

- Simple to learn, anyone can play!

- Start at any difficulty, and play at your own pace!

- Over 100 levels!

- Featuring puzzles designed by Pixelated Cowboy!

Enjoy the brain twisting, tetromino spinning fun of Neon Snap!

Neon Snap is also available on the iPhone App Store, and Android via Google Play, Amazon Appstore, and Samsung Apps!
